last_episode_to_air.name: Lieutenant in the Lake
last_episode_to_air.overview: Atlanta Police Lt. Doug Overstreet is a devoted husband, father, and policeman. So when his bullet-riddled body turns up naked and floating in the murky waters of South Carolina’s Lake Thurmond, officers across three jurisdictions are left dumbfounded.

name: Bloodlands
overview: In this documentary series, the discovery of a gruesome crime scene in a remote area sets investigators on the trail of a killer.

episodes.name: Lefthand Canyon
episodes.overview: When a young wife and mother, Natalie Mirabal, is found murdered and decapitated in Colorado's Lefthand Canyon, detectives uncover shocking secrets in this quiet, Rocky Mountain community.

episodes.name: Death on the Range
episodes.overview: A Texas A&M student leaves campus and never returns as his badly decomposed body is found 130 miles from campus.

episodes.name: Signal Mountain Murders
episodes.overview: Two days after Richard Mason, Kenneth Griffith and Earl Smock go for a ride along steep cliffs of Tennessee's Signal Mountains, their ATVs are found bloodied and abandoned.

episodes.name: Runaway Girl
episodes.overview: An aspiring 17-year-old model never makes it home following a party after her first photo shoot, and her body is found the next day in a snowy forest.

episodes.name: A Gamble in the Desert
episodes.overview: Las Vegas bookie Bruce Weinstein vanishes one summer night, leaving behind a bloody mattress with a bullet hole.

episodes.name: Lieutenant in the Lake
episodes.overview: Atlanta Police Lt. Doug Overstreet is a devoted husband, father, and policeman. So when his bullet-riddled body turns up naked and floating in the murky waters of South Carolina’s Lake Thurmond, officers across three jurisdictions are left dumbfounded.
